page.title: 03Fison's Eclipse Peat Works
page.content: Background:- In 5000 B.C. the land was laid down and over the years it developed into peat.Until 1961 the land was hand dug.In the same year, the present company took over and expanded the business. The total area for peat processing is 3000 acres, but only 1100 acres are used. The company gives{employment}to 65 people but more are employed in the Summer as the peat is turned by hand to enable it to dry. 70% of the{peat}produced is sold to amateur gardeners and the other 30% goes to industry. When the peat has all been extracted the land will be sold to{farmers, private buyers or{conservationists.
